name: BirDrunCar
description:
ATOMIC FABRIK GAMES IN STEAM:

  1. Project First Contact: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...
  2. The Last Hope Trump vs Mafia http://store.steampowered.com/app/581030
  3. The Last Hope http://store.steampowered.com/app/522570

BirDrunCar launches you into a new open-world inspired by the coastline with desert, forest, seaside and mountainous regions landscape with an excellent Chevrolet Camaro from Atomic Fabrik company the award-winning studio behind the game You vs Zombies, BirDrunCar will redefine explore games in a new generation.


You'll experience stunning speeds, accidents,flights in a beautiful world inspired by the coastline with desert, forest, seaside,mountainous regions,beautifuls houses, skyscrapers roads(city/village) and the most expected in this game tunnels and roads as rollen-coaster.You will fly in air and you will fly above the sea, constantly moving your gameplay in new and unique directions. Loaded with action, this game will challenge you to become a true professional driver.

Key Features

+Cars –In BirDrunCar the cars go from hot to hotter. Experience the thrill of driving the world's most desirable high performance cars at incredible speeds. Feel the power,be as a racer.

+BirDrunCar Country – Explore a world inspired by the coastline with desert, forest, seaside and mountainous regions.

+Restart from start point

+Optimisation – This game is very good optimisated for all pc.

Graphic settings

From 620x480 to 1920x1080

Graphic quality: Fastest/Fast/Simple/Good/Beautiful/Fantastic

It can be played with an keyboard or with an joystick

SOON

*MORE CARS

*BIGGER MAP

*GAME WITH LEVELS

*MULTIPLAYER MOD

*Birdruncar for ANDROID on 5 february 2016 RELEASE DATE

*Birdruncar forIOS/LINUX/MAC
